# fl-form-control



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property     | Attribute      | Description                                              | Type     | Default     |
| ------------ | -------------- | -------------------------------------------------------- | -------- | ----------- |
| `helpText`   | `help-text`    | The help text (if the help-text slot isn't used)         | `string` | `undefined` |
| `helpTextId` | `help-text-id` | The help text id, used to map the input to the help text | `string` | `undefined` |
| `inputId`    | `input-id`     | The input id, used to map the input to the label         | `string` | `undefined` |
| `label`      | `label`        | The label text (if the label slot isn't used)            | `string` | `undefined` |
| `labelId`    | `label-id`     | The label id, used to map the label to the input         | `string` | `undefined` |


## Shadow Parts

| Part          | Description |
| ------------- | ----------- |
| `"base"`      |             |
| `"help-text"` |             |
| `"input"`     |             |
| `"label"`     |             |
